Text: heyMike Whats up man I see you made it back Give me a holla or email whenever you get a chance Ben

heyMike Hey got your voicemail Sorry I didnt email you sooner Funny what you said in the voicemail cause tomorrow is actually my last day at Enron I just gave my notice last Monday Im going to be doing some accounting and tax work reporting not compliance for a Fortune energy company cant tell you from this email address in downtown Houston In the Fall Ill probably go at night and work on an MBA since I got the CPA out of the way My thinking is that I can eventually move out of accounting and do some financial stuff If it dont work out I can always call Henry and Aziz back If I dont see you before I leave lets definitely keep in touch My personal email address is mailto yep thats real coming up with a website too as soon as I think of an idea Let me give you my phone info as well What part of town you staying at Home Cell Take it easy Ben
